title: Can not get past the loading screen after Champ Select
body: I have recently encountered a bug that makes me not able to join a game after champ select. After champ select, there is the loading screen with all the champion portraits on it. Instead of loading into the game, i reach a certain percentage while loading the game then it freezes. After freezing it completely makes me unable to tab out of the screen which makes me have to turn my computer off. I have encountered this in every mode, let it be customs or normal games. Any help with this problem is very much appreciated.

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, I definitely recommend [disabling the Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), as the anniversary update enabled a problematic feature called *Game DVR*. 

Let me know if that caused any change for you.

Thanks for taking the time to look at my problem, I very much appreciate getting help from riot itself. However I have already tried disabling the game bar and yet the problem persists. I have also tried a client repair, but that still does not help.

Darn, I hoped that would have worked for ya!

We can definitely investigate further, but we'll need to take a look at some system logs in order to do so. I recommend running a set of these logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attaching them to a [support ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will be able to dive into those logs and 360 no-scope the cause of these issues with you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello, are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
